p: Broadly, however, governments need two policy instruments to deal with the pandemic: A mitigating policy and a Post Covid-19 recovery and rejuvenation policy. The mitigation policy will be a Health policy-a Proactive Health Policy framework and Management approach. This will involve containment measures; protection of health providers (provision of Personal Protection Equipment (PPEs) and incentives); Testing centres and kits; Isolation centres with relevant facilities etcetera), in addition to aggressive education and health literacy.
